verses.verse: Now <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2388>established<s%> himself <S%H2388>securely<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> [was] with him and <S%H1431>exalted<s%> him <S%H4605>greatly.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> and to the <S%H8199>judges<s%> and to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5387>leader<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households.]

Then <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> with him, <S%H1980>went<s%> to the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was at <S%H1391>Gibeon;<s%> for God's <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> was <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

<S%H61>However,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5927>brought<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> from Kiriath-jearim to the place he had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for it; for he had <S%H5186>pitched<s%> a <S%H168>tent<s%> for it in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Now the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> had <S%H6213>made,<s%> was <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> and the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> <S%H1875>sought<s%> it out.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [was] at the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> on it.
In that <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7592>"Ask<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you."

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> "Thou hast <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with my father <S%H1>David<s%> with <S%H1732>great<s%> <S%H1419>lovingkindness,<s%> and hast <S%H2617>made<s%> me <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> Thy <S%H1697>promise<s%> to my father <S%H1>David<s%> is <S%H1732>fulfilled;<s%> for Thou hast <S%H539>made<s%> me <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H4427>over<s%> a <S%H5921>people<s%> as <S%H5971>numerous<s%> as the <S%H7227>dust<s%> of the <S%H6083>earth.<s%>

<S%H5414>"Give<s%> me <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4093>knowledge,<s%> that I may <S%H3318>go<s%> out and <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> for <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H8199>rule<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of Thine?"

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> in <S%H3824>mind,<s%> and did not <S%H7592>ask<s%> for <S%H6239>riches,<s%> <S%H5233>wealth,<s%> or <S%H9202>honor,<s%> or the <S%H5315>life<s%> of those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> have you <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> for <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>life,<s%> but you have <S%H7592>asked<s%> for yourself <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4093>knowledge,<s%> that you may <S%H8199>rule<s%> My <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H4427>made<s%> you <S%H4427>king,<s%>

<S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4093>knowledge<s%> have been <S%H5414>granted<s%> to you. And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H5233>wealth<s%> and <S%H9202>honor,<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> <S%H3651><s%> as <S%H3808>none<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> you has <S%H1961>possessed,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> those who will come <S%H310>after<s%> you. "

So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> from the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was at <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> from the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H622>amassed<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%> He <S%H1961>had<s%> 1400 <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and 12000 <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and he <S%H5117>stationed<s%> them in the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> and with the <S%H4428>king<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> as <S%H7230>plentiful<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> as <S%H68>stones,<s%> and he <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H730>cedars<s%> as <S%H7230>plentiful<s%> as <S%H8256>sycamores<s%> in the <S%H8219>lowland.<s%>

And Solomon's <S%H5483>horses<s%> were <S%H4161>imported<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and from <S%H9510>Kue;<s%> the king's <S%H5503>traders<s%> <S%H3947>procured<s%> them from <S%H9510>Kue<s%> for a <S%H4242>price.<s%>

And they <S%H5927>imported<s%> <S%H3318><s%> <S%H4818>chariots<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H600>for<s%> [shekels] of <S%H3701>silver<s%> apiece, and <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H150>for<s%> apiece, and by the <S%H3651>same<s%> <S%H3651>means<s%> <S%H3027><s%> they <S%H3318>exported<s%> them to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H758>Aram.<s%>
